Events.OnCreate: (block () ; Set a timer so that we can do some custom behavior (sysAddObjRecurringTimerEvent 10 gSource "OnBehavior") (objSetData gSource "tick" 0) )
Events.OrderDeter:
(block () ; Send some of the escorts to attack the threat (for i 1 (objGetData gSource "escortCount") (block (theEscort) (setq theEscort (objGetObjRefData gSource (cat "escort" i))) (if (leq (objGetDestiny theEscort) 180) (objCommunicate theEscort gSource 1 aTargetObj) ) ) )
; Remember state (objSetObjRefData gSource "target" aTargetObj) (objRegisterForEvents gSource aTargetObj) (objSetData gSource "behavior" 'deterring) )

Events.OnRefuel:
; Chance that this will enhance the ship's drive (if (leq (random 1 100) (multiply 2 (itmGetCount gItem))) (objEnumItems gSource "rI" theItem (switch (itmIsDamaged theItem) (block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat "Your " (itmGetName theItem 0) " has been repaired.")) (shpRepairItem gSource theItem) )
(not (itmIsEnhanced theItem)) (block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat "Your " (itmGetName theItem 0) " has been enhanced.")) (shpEnhanceItem gSource theItem) ) ) ) )

Events.OnDamageArmor:
(block Nil ; Add the pteravore overlay, but only if we don't already ; have too many overlays
(if (leq (count (objGetOverlays gSource)) 12) (objAddOverlay gSource &ovPteravoreFuelDrain; aHitPos (modulo (add aHitDir 180) 360) ) )
; Return full damage aDamageHP )
Events.OnDamageShields:
(block (probTable) ; Chance of passing through the shield is based on level (setq probTable '(100 100 ; Level I 100 ; Level II 100 ; Level III 100 ; Level IV 100 ; Level V 100 ; Level VI 100 ; Level VII 100 ; Level VIII 95 ; Level IX 85 ; Level X 65 ; Level XI 30 ; Level XII 5 ; Level XIII 0 ; Level XIV and higher ) )
(if (leq (random 1 100) (item probTable (min 14 (itmGetLevel aDeviceItem))))
; If we penetrate shields, then return full damage aDamageHP
; Otherwise, we return Nil to indicate that normal shield handling applies Nil ) )

; The pteravore is attached to the armor, so we always skip shields
aDamageHP

Events.OnDamage:
(switch ; Skip if we are hit by a pteravore (eq aWeaponType &vtPteravoreSporeLauncher;) Nil
; Overlay gets damaged (block Nil (if (leq (objIncOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "hp" (subtract 0 aDamageHP)) 0) (objRemoveOverlay gSource aOverlayID) )
; We take all the damage 0 ) )
Events.OnInsuranceClaim: ; Insurance cleans up pteravores (objRemoveOverlay gSource aOverlayID)
Events.OnUpdate:
(block Nil
; Consume some fuel (switch ; If we've already consumed enough, then we detach (gr (objGetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "fuelConsumed") 500000) (block Nil (sysCreateWeaponFire &vtPteravoreSporeLauncher; gSource (objGetPos gSource) (random 0 359) 12 (sysFindObject gSource "TN +pteravore;") ) (objRemoveOverlay gSource aOverlayID) )
; For the player ship, consume fuel ; (about 1 pteracnium rod every 2 seconds (eq gSource gPlayerShip) (block Nil (shpConsumeFuel gPlayerShip 12500) (objIncOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "fuelConsumed" 12500) )
; If we have the timer on, then wait (objGetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "timer") (if (leq (objIncOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "timer" -1) 0) (objSetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "timer" Nil) )
; For other ships, consume fuel out of cargo space (block (theItem) ; Choose a random fuel item (setq theItem (random (objGetItems gSource "f")))
(if theItem (block (fuelPerItem) (setq fuelPerItem (max 2500 (itmGetTypeData theItem)))
; Consume one pteracnium rod worth (setq consumeCount (max 1 (min (itmGetCount theItem) (divide 50000 fuelPerItem))))
; Consume the item (objRemoveItem gSource theItem consumeCount) (objIncOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "fuelConsumed" (multiply consumeCount fuelPerItem))
; Wait a while before consuming more (objSetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "timer" (max 1 (divide (multiply consumeCount fuelPerItem) 12500)) ) )
; If no fuel is found, wait a while before we try again (objSetOverlayData gSource aOverlayID "timer" 101) ) ) )
; There is a chance that the pteravore will do some damage (if (leq (random 1 100) 5) (block (result)
; Do damage (setq result (objDamage gSource &vtPteravoreBite; '("pteravores" 0x40) (objGetOverlayPos gSource aOverlayID) ))
(switch ; If the source was destroyed by the damage, then ; we don't do anything else (gSource is invalid)
(eq result 'destroyed) Nil
; Otherwise, tell the player what happened
(objSendMessage gSource gSource "Pteravores have damaged the ship!") ) ) ) )
